ground_truth_reviews.comment: The `random` module is not cryptographically secure and should not be used for generating security-sensitive values like edit tokens. Its output is predictable, which could allow an attacker to guess tokens and gain unauthorized access to edit posts. Please use the `secrets` module, like `secrets.token_hex(16)`, for generating such tokens.

title: feat: Add edit token generation for posts
body: This change introduces a new service method to generate a temporary token that can be used to grant editing permissions for a specific post.
